I understand that my ATOM in Cosmos Staking is subject to a 21-day unbonding period when I unstake, as enforced by the Cosmos network.
I understand that my unstaked ATOM is subject to a 21-day unbonding period, as enforced by the Cosmos network. During this period, my unbonding balance will not accrue any rewards.
I understand that my CRO in Crypto.org Chain Staking is subject to a 28-day unbonding period when I unstake, as enforced by the Crypto.org Chain network.
I understand that my unstaked CRO is subject to a 28-day unbonding period, as enforced by the Crypto.org Chain network. During this period, my unbonding balance will not accrue any rewards.

Rewards received from Crypto.org Chain Staking are shared with the validator, as the validator charges a commission for transaction validation and node operation. The commission is a fixed percentage of your corresponding staking reward and is directly applied to your reward balance.

Aave is a liquidity protocol that allows you to earn interest by lending your crypto to borrowers. Upon making a deposit, you will receive interest-bearing aTokens, which represents your underlying crypto assets. You can use the aTokens to withdraw your deposit and the accrued interest at any time.

Compound is a protocol that allows you to lend your crypto to borrowers and earn interest over time. The interest is accrued via cTokens, which will be sent to you after the deposit to represent your deposited crypto assets. You can withdraw your deposit together with the accrued interest using your cTokens at any time.
Operated on the Cronos blockchain, VVS Finance is using automated market-maker (AMM) and provides a platform for everyone to swap and earn yields at low transaction fees and low slippage rates.

Yearn Earn is a lending aggregator that optimises the interest accrual process across multiple protocols to obtain the highest rates at all times. Deposits are automatically shifted between dYdX, AAVE, and Compound as rates change.
After your TONIC is unstaked, it will be held for %1$s before you can withdraw it. If you attempt to unstake more during this cooldown period, the countdown will be reset to %1$s.
By confirming the deposit, I agree and understand my funds will be transferred to third party smart contracts and not through Crypto.com. Crypto.com remains as a facilitator of the deposit process.
By confirming the stake, I agree and understand my funds will be transferred to third party smart contracts and not through Crypto.com. Crypto.com remains as a facilitator of the staking process.

A solution that grants higher rewards rates when you deposit your xVVS for fixed terms. xVVS is VVS Finance’s yield-bearing governance token.
A solution that grants higher rewards rates when you deposit your xFER for fixed terms. xFER is Ferro Protocol’s yield-bearing governance token.
Visit the VVS Finance Crystal Farm to know more about the pool insights and pair info.
Visit the 3FER Pool to know more about the pool insights and pair info.

Tectonic is a decentralised money market on the Cronos chain. Users can deposit assets to earn a passive yield or access loans to boost their liquidity. Yields are dynamic, so check back regularly for the best rates.
Before withdrawing your TONIC tokens, you will need to unstake them and wait for a %1$s cooldown period to expire. This cooldown will reset if you attempt to unstake more during the %1$s days.

Depositing crypto assets involve calling the ETH smart contract which requires ETH as network fees, hence the estimated network fee will be higher than normal transfers. Please ensure you have sufficient ETH in your wallet before proceeding.

Depositing crypto assets involve calling the Cronos smart contract which requires CRO as network fees, hence the estimated network fee will be higher than normal transfers. Please ensure you have sufficient Cronos CRO in your wallet before proceeding.

Staking crypto assets involve calling the Cronos smart contract which requires CRO as network fees, hence the estimated network fee will be higher than normal transfers. Please ensure you have sufficient Cronos CRO in your wallet before proceeding.

Aave is a liquidity protocol that allows you to earn interest by lending your crypto to borrowers. Upon making a deposit, you will receive interest-bearing aTokens, which represents your underlying crypto assets. You can use the aTokens to withdraw your deposit and the accrued interest at any time.

Compound is a protocol that allows you to lend your crypto to borrowers and earn interest over time. The interest is accrued via cTokens, which will be sent to you after the deposit to represent your deposited crypto assets. You can withdraw your deposit together with the accrued interest using your cTokens at any time.
Operated on the Cronos blockchain, VVS Finance is using automated market-maker (AMM) and provides a platform for everyone to swap and earn yields at low transaction fees and low slippage rates.

Yearn Earn is a lending aggregator that optimises the interest accrual process across multiple protocols to obtain the highest rates at all times. Deposits are automatically shifted between dYdX, AAVE, and Compound as rates change.

Tectonic is a decentralised money market on the Cronos chain. Users can deposit assets to earn a passive yield or access loans to boost their liquidity. Yields are dynamic, so check back regularly for the best rates.

The validator is being jailed due to downtime or double-signing and is currently not earning any block rewards. You may switch your staked balance to a different validator or unstake from this validator.

Aave is a liquidity protocol that allows you to earn interest by lending your crypto to borrowers. Upon making a deposit, you will receive interest-bearing aTokens, which represents your underlying crypto assets. You can use the aTokens to withdraw your deposit and the accrued interest at any time.

Compound is a protocol that allows you to lend your crypto to borrowers and earn interest over time. The interest is accrued via cTokens, which will be sent to you after the deposit to represent your deposited crypto assets. You can withdraw your deposit together with the accrued interest using your cTokens at any time.

Cosmos Staking is enabled via delegated-proof-of-stake (DPoS) consensus on the Cosmos Network. You can stake your ATOM to a Validator that validates transactions on the chain and earn rewards in ATOM.

Crypto.org Chain Staking is enabled via delegated-proof-of-stake (DPoS) consensus on the Crypto.org Chain Network. You can stake your CRO to a Validator that validates transactions on the chain and earn rewards in CRO.
Operated on the Cronos blockchain, VVS Finance is using automated market-maker (AMM) and provides a platform for everyone to swap and earn yields at low transaction fees and low slippage rates.

Yearn Earn is a lending aggregator that optimises the interest accrual process across multiple protocols to obtain the highest rates at all times. Deposits are automatically shifted between dYdX, AAVE, and Compound as rates change.

Participating in an LP vs holding on to your tokens

When token\’s price rises: Holding onto your tokens is more profitable because you can sell it \n\n When token\’s price drops: Participating in an LP is more profitable because you earn trading fees and other incentives

It is a vault where assets can be deposited to provide liquidity for a decentralised exchange (Uniswap, PancakeSwap, etc). In return for depositing their assets, participants receive crypto rewards and a share of the trading fees.
IL refers to the loss in dollar value of your deposited assets versus simply leaving them in your wallet. This is due to the volatility of your asset\'s trading pairs.
LP participants can grow their holdings by receiving a share of the decentralised exchange\'s trading fees, crypto rewards, and other benefits.

A new version of Crypto.com DeFi Wallet is available\nWhat’s new in v%1$s:

A memory palace is essentially your personal well-known location that you visualize and lay down the 12/18/24 words as you go from room to room. The same works for a story that you link up with your recovery phrase.\n\nOnce committed to memory and rehearsed a few times, you will be able to learn the words by heart. Keep a physical copy of your recovery phrase with a backup in your head and you will be protected when everything goes wrong.
Put your recovery phrase in a bank vault or safety deposit box.

The Shamir\'s Secret Sharing is a form of secret sharing where a secret is divided into parts, giving each its own unique part.\n\nIf you don\'t like the split and share approach, you can still retain all the parts but store them in separate locations.
Incorrect passcode, app will be locked for 30 minutes after %1$s failed attempts
Please be aware that this validator has been flagged by the community for frequent commission rate changes, which may result in the loss of delegators’ staking rewards.
Aave is an open-source liquidity protocol that lets you earn interest by lending your crypto to borrowers. Interest rates are based on the market borrowing demand.
Compound is a protocol that lets you lend your crypto to borrowers and earn interest. You can withdraw your deposit and accrued interest at any time.
Cosmos is an ecosystem of interconnected blockchains. You earn interest, secure the blockchain, and improve its governance when you stake ATOM.
The Crypto.org Chain is an open-source and permissionless blockchain. By staking CRO, you help validate transactions on the network and earn interest.

Tectonic is a decentralised money market on the Cronos chain. Users can deposit assets to earn a passive yield or access loans to boost their liquidity. Yields are dynamic, so check back regularly for the best rates.

Ferro is a StableSwap AMM protocol with deep liquidity. It’s built on the Cronos blockchain and is designed for low-cost and low-slippage stablecoin swaps. Traders can easily swap tokens while liquidity providers are rewarded for their deposits.
VVS Finance is a decentralized exchange operating on the Cronos blockchain. You earn interest on the platform through yield farming or liquidity mining.
Yearn Earn is a lending aggregator that automatically moves your deposits between DeFi protocols to obtain the best interest rates.
Crypto.org Chain is a proof-of-stake (PoS) blockchain network and CRO Staking for everyday users is enabled via delegated-proof-of-stake (DPoS) consensus protocol.
Cosmos is a proof-of-stake (PoS) blockchain network and Cosmos Staking for everyday users is enabled via delegated-proof-of-stake (DPoS) consensus protocol.

The Polkadot network requires addresses to hold a minimum existential deposit of 1 DOT. Please receive at least 1 DOT for your first transaction, or else it will fail before your DOT Wallet is activated.

The %1$s Ledger requires all wallets to have a minimum balance of %2$s for account activation and usage. Please fund your account with at least %3$s and this amount will remain locked in your wallet and will not be spendable.

Legacy address is the original BTC address while SegWit is the newer address format with lower fees. SegWit means Segregated Witness, where Segregated is to separate and Witness is the transaction signatures involved with a specific transaction. In a nutshell, it is an improvement over the current bitcoin blockchain which reduces the size needed to store transactions in a block.

NEAR Protocol requires all wallets to have a minimum balance of %1$s for account activation. Please receive at least %2$s for your first transaction, or else it will fail before your NEAR Wallet is activated.

Powered by Ethermint, Cronos Testnet is the trial version of Cronos, the Crypto.org EVM Chain—allowing rapid porting of apps and smart contracts from Ethereum. You can receive test CRO to transact on the Cronos Testnet using the TCRO Faucet.

Croeseid Testnet is the trial version of the Crypto.com Chain—a secure, low cost, and open source blockchain powered by the Cosmos SDK. You can receive test CRO to transact on the Croeseid Testnet using the TCRO Faucet.

ETH Testnet is a simulation blockchain that allows you to trial Ethereum transfers and smart contracts without using real tokens. Testnet tokens are distinct from ETH/ERC-20 tokens, as they do not have monetary value.
Your Anti-phishing Code on DeFi Wallet is shared with your connected Crypto.com App account. Go to Crypto.com App or Exchange if you want to change or remove the code.
We recommend you to change the code every 30 days to enhance account security.
By setting up a unique Anti-phishing code that will be included in all genuine Crypto.com emails, you will be able to identify if the emails are from Crypto.com or phishing attempts.

Price Impact is the influence a swap has over the underlying asset pair’s market price. It is directly affected by the swap size and market liquidity. Swapping illiquid pairs can have a significant Price Impact and cause the price of your asset to fall.
Your price/network fee has expired. Please update to the latest price to continue

Staking assets represent the staking, reward and unbonding balances locked or distributed via the proof-of-stake blockchain protocols.
Synthetic assets represent the underlying assets of your DeFi Earn deposits, as well as the interest accrued over time from the corresponding DeFi Earn protocol.

Note: It is possible to create fake versions of existing tokens. Visit the FAQ to learn more about the risks of importing tokens.
Token addresses detail the location of the token contract, which manages the logic of the token. You can find this information by going to the token’s website.

Decimals refers to how divisible a token can be, from 0 (not divisible at all) to 18 (essentially continuous) or higher. The number reflects the decimal places to the right of the decimal point when displaying token values.

Token names are what the token contract is referred to (e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto.com Coin). Please note that different tokens can have the same name, so it’s not a unique identifier. You can confirm the name by checking the token address.
The network is the blockchain that the token is built on, such as Ethereum or Polygon. You can find this information by going to the token’s website.

Token symbols are an abbreviation of the token name (e.g., BTC, ETH, CRO). Usually 3 to 4 characters in length, they are broadly equivalent to a stock ticker. Please note that different tokens can have the same symbol, so it’s not a unique identifier. You can confirm the symbol by checking the token address.

Aave is a liquidity protocol that allows you to earn interest by lending your crypto to borrowers. Upon making a deposit, you will receive interest-bearing aTokens, which represents your underlying crypto assets. You can use the aTokens to withdraw your deposit and the accrued interest at any time.

Compound is a protocol that allows you to lend your crypto to borrowers and earn interest over time. The interest is accrued via cTokens, which will be sent to you after the deposit to represent your deposited crypto assets. You can withdraw your deposit together with the accrued interest using your cTokens at any time.
Operated on the Cronos blockchain, VVS Finance is using automated market-maker (AMM) and provides a platform for everyone to swap and earn yields at low transaction fees and low slippage rates.

Yearn Earn is a lending aggregator that optimises the interest accrual process across multiple protocols to obtain the highest rates at all times. Deposits are automatically shifted between dYdX, AAVE, and Compound as rates change.
After your TONIC is unstaked, it will be held for %1$s before you can withdraw it. If you attempt to unstake more during this cooldown period, the countdown will be reset to %1$s.
I understand and agree to the Crypto.com DeFi Wallet Terms & Conditions.

By confirming the claim rewards, I agree and understand my funds will be transferred to third party smart contracts and not through Crypto.com. Crypto.com remains as a facilitator of the claim process.

By confirming the unstake, I agree and understand my underlying assets will be transferred from third party smart contracts and not through Crypto.com. Crypto.com remains as a facilitator of the unstaking process.

By confirming the withdrawal, I agree and understand my underlying assets will be transferred from third party smart contracts and not through Crypto.com. Crypto.com remains as a facilitator of the withdrawal process.

By confirming the withdrawal, I agree and understand my funds will be transferred from third party smart contracts and not through Crypto.com. Crypto.com remains as a facilitator of the withdrawal process.

A solution that grants higher rewards rates when you deposit your xVVS for fixed terms. xVVS is VVS Finance’s yield-bearing governance token.
A solution that grants higher rewards rates when you deposit your xFER for fixed terms. xFER is Ferro Protocol’s yield-bearing governance token.

Tectonic is a decentralised money market on the Cronos chain. Users can deposit assets to earn a passive yield or access loans to boost their liquidity. Yields are dynamic, so check back regularly for the best rates.
Crypto.com charges a fee for subscribing to our DeFi Earn services. The service fee is 0.5% of your corresponding earnings for the withdrawal.

Claiming crypto assets involve calling the Cronos smart contract which requires CRO as network fees, hence the estimated network fee will be higher than normal transfers. Please ensure you have sufficient Cronos CRO in your wallet before proceeding.

Unstaking crypto assets involve calling the Cronos smart contract which requires CRO as network fees, hence the estimated network fee will be higher than normal transfers. Please ensure you have sufficient Cronos CRO in your wallet before proceeding.

Withdrawing crypto assets involve calling the ETH smart contract which requires ETH as network fees, hence the estimated network fee will be higher than normal transfers. Please ensure you have sufficient ETH in your wallet before proceeding.

Withdrawing crypto assets involve calling the Cronos smart contract which requires CRO as network fees, hence the estimated network fee will be higher than normal transfers. Please ensure you have sufficient Cronos CRO in your wallet before proceeding.

Withdrawing crypto assets involve calling the Cronos smart contract which requires CRO as network fees, hence the estimated network fee will be higher than normal transfers. Please ensure you have sufficient Cronos CRO in your wallet before proceeding.
All existing rewards within xVVS vault will be automatically claimed.
40% of FER rewards will be converted to xFER and vested after one month of lockup period.
Yearn Vaults charges an additional 0.5% fee on funds withdrawn from active strategies (no withdrawal fees apply for idle funds). Withdraw a smaller amount or at a later time to avoid the 0.5% fee.
